snippet.title: Decline's Drops - KICKSTARTER Trailer
snippet.description:
The time has come! Decline's Drops is now LIVE on Kickstarter! 
Take the powerful gameplay of Super Smash Bros., the level design mastery of Yoshi's Island and the cuteness of the Kirby series and you get Decline's Drops, a 2d hand-drawn platform-brawler!


More informations here:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/decline-s-drops/declines-drops
Twitter:
https://twitter.com/moulinauxbulles
